name: (EN-ES) Laws Of the President
description:
LINK A LA VERSIÓN EN ESPAÑOL: https://missingwilliam.itch.io/las-leyes-del-presidente

A simple game choice for La Union's School Integrated Project, based on real corruption cases from the peruvian government.

Every presidents initial budget is 500k. They must use all money available for the welfare of the people, and not to other ends. Saving the money represents an act of corruption.

Credits:

- Programmed by: Ítalo Larios

- Sprites by: Ítalo Larios

- Cover Image by: Lionel Páucar

- Music and sfx by: Ítalo Larios

- Starting Scene Prototype: Joaquín Gonzáles

- Other "Colaborators": Luana Agarie & Isabel Herrera

MOST OF THE EVENTS SHOWN IN THIS GAME ARE BASED OFF REAL PERUVIAN EVENTS. THIS GAME WAS MADE BY A GROUP OF HIGHSCHOOLERS, FEEL FREE TO CRITICISE AND CORRECT ANY DETAILS AS MUCH AS YOU WISH.

THIS GAME DOES NOT SHOWN A TOTALLY REALISTIC VERSION OF HOW POLITICS WORK AND SHOULD NOT BE TAKEN AS A REFERENT. THE ONLY PURPOSE OF THIS PROJECT WAS TO REPORT IN AN INTERACTIVE (AND HOPEFULLY FUN) WAY.
